This NDoH service only provides health i: Le nkonzo ye-NDoH inikezela ngolwazi lwezempilo. Nceda uvume unoxanduva lokukhathalela impilo yakho nonyango lwakho.
Buyela usebenzise le nkonzo nanini na. Khumbula, ukuba ucinga une-TB, kuphephe ukunxibelelana nabanye abantu kwaye uye kuvavanywa kwikliniki ekufutshane nawe.
TB HealthCheck does not replace medical: TB HealthCheck ayithathi ngcebiso zonyango. Fumana ingcebiso engaphezulu kumboneleli wezempilo ofanelekileyo kwimeko yakho yonyango kunye nokunakekelwa.
You use this info at your own risk. This: Sebenzisa olu lwazi ngomngcipheko wakho. Vuma awuzotyeshela okanye ulibazise ukufumana amacebo ngempilo nonyango okanye unonophelo
